fields.name: Litter Run
fields.default_instructions: Collect litter along the river bank. Focus on plastic waste and debris. Wear gloves and use litter pickers. Separate recyclable materials if possible.

fields.name: Weeding
fields.default_instructions: Remove invasive plant species. Focus on areas where native plants are being outcompeted. Bag and remove invasive plants to prevent regrowth.

fields.name: Planting
fields.default_instructions: Plant native species according to the rehabilitation plan. Ensure proper spacing and watering. Record species and quantities planted.
